name: Enjoy Your Drink
description:
You are scared. Your parents don't want to pay for you anymore and it's time to earn money by yourself.

You are a waiter at a high society penguin party and your boss seems like a total dugong. The guests are total snobs, almost always thirsty and you better don't want to know, what will happen when you can't fulfill their needs.

Can you make all the guests happy and prove your boss, you are a perfect fit for this job by gaining enough points?

Good Luck.

---

This game was developed during the seven days Kindred Communiy Jam #5 .
